data.name: Kingdom Legends: The fallen kings
data.detailed_description:
Kingdom Legends: The fallen kings is a roguelike experience that lets you take control of an adventurer king exploring a long forgone fortress after a disastrously multi nation invasion gone wrong.

The fortress is a mischievous place that many odd creatures call home now and it might never be recovered from the enemy's claws.

Discover what happened with the invasion reinforcements, get clues around the fortress and be careful with the enemies.
Every run is different and lore items might not always spawn on every run.

Some random events might include extra lore content odds are a bit tricky sometimes.
We hope you enjoy the multiple random events you can encounter.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
